name: Daniel Dominic Kaplan Sleator
content: Daniel Dominic Kaplan Sleator Daniel Dominic Kaplan Sleator Professor of Computer Science sleator@cs.cmu.edu Office: 7205 Gates-Hillman phone: 412-268-7563 fax: 412-268-5576 US Mail: Department of Computer Science Carnegie Mellon University 5000 Forbes Avenue Pittsburgh PA 15213-3891 Home: 15 Hollenden Place Pittsburgh PA 15217 phone: 412-422-5377 (412-HACKERS) PGP Public Key Some projects I've worked on: Splay Trees Link Parser Music Analyzer MELISMA Chessclub.com Papers: Here are some of my papers in PDF format. Politics: Teaching: Algorithms 15-451/651, Spring 2015 Competition Programming 15-295, Spring 2015 Algorithms 15-451/651, Fall 2014 (Gap to be filled in, including 251, 451, 210, 295) Competition Programming, Spring 2011 Fundamental Algorithms and Data Structures (15-211), Spring 2011 Mathematical Games, Spring 2011 Competition Programming and Problem Solving, Fall 2010 Great Ideas in Theoretical Computer Science, Fall 2010 Great Ideas in Theoretical Computer Science, Spring 2010 Advanced Algorithms, Fall 2009 Advanced Data Structures, Fall 2007 15-211, Spring 2007 15-211, Fall 2006 Algorithms, Spring 2006 Advanced Data Structures, Fall 2005 Mathematical Games, Spring 2005 Algorithms, Spring 2004 Mathematical Games, Fall 2001 Graduate Algorithms, Spring 2001 Algorithms, Fall 2000 Graduate Algorithms, Spring 1999 My brother Tycho Sleator's home page. My brother William Sleator's home page. Here's a page with a few links to work by my mother Esther Sleator.
